title: Man I'm bored
body: I'm wanting to play League so badly but can't because of the 2 week suspension i have rip. i wold create a smurf account but i can't be bothered to play with bad low mmr players. Too much of a struggle lol. What do i do???????????? I got access to the alpha client but can't even play. ughhhhhh. help pls

replies.body:
Maybe dont intentional feed in the future then? 2 week suspension is a good idea i feel.
Also you are only in silver your mmr isnt that high

> [{quoted}](name=Aidan7787,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=njhh2rrX,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-07T13:18:01.017+0000)
>
> Maybe dont intentional feed in the future then? 2 week suspension is a good idea i feel.
> Also you are only in silver your mmr isnt that high

I know that now...

> can't be bothered to play with bad low mmr players

and silver 4 is pretty low...
if u create new account most of low level exp players are smurfs anyways
Dota? ;) jk. At least I tried.
